data.message: Last year at this time, everyone was wishing me a happy birthday. Problem was that my birthday is July 3 and not September 14. Can this please be fixed in my notifications so my friends can wish me a happy birthday on my birthday? Please? I have been putting in requests, and I get messages back that this issue has been corrected, however, it is not fixed.  Can it please get fixed? Please? Thank you in advance.

replies.message: Hi Linda. You can change your birthday as well as choose who you share it with. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2dWmIW1. -Elizabeth
That is not the problem,  I have my birthday correct,  it is not showing to my friends in the notification. Please help.
